TEI.2.document_title: James Cummins to Stephen F. Austin, 06-09-1826

barker_notes.barker_summary: James Cummins to Austin, June 9, 1826. Concerning an elopement.
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 1354

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*James Cummins to Austin, June 9, 1826. Concerning an elopement.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Colorado */location_mentioned**date_mentioned n="06-09-1826">June 9—1826*/date_mentioned*—*/p* *p*Dear Sir,*/p*
*p*after gitting *person_mentioned*Francisco Eliguem*/person_mentioned* and *person_mentioned*Mr. Woods*/person_mentioned* together got them to agree that thier *person_mentioned*Son */person_mentioned*and *person_mentioned*Daughter */person_mentioned*might get married *person_mentioned*Francisco*/person_mentioned* wants you to write to*location_mentioned* Montraville Woods*/location_mentioned* at *location_mentioned**person_mentioned*Mr. Milligan */person_mentioned*s*/location_mentioned* to bring his *person_mentioned*daughter */person_mentioned*Down to you and for you to write to a *person_mentioned*praist */person_mentioned*in *location_mentioned*Laberhe */location_mentioned*to marry them and to assure the *person_mentioned*priest */person_mentioned*that he *person_mentioned*Francisco */person_mentioned*has given his Consent that they might be married agreed to and subscribed to before me*person_mentioned* James Cummins*/person_mentioned**/p* *p*his marke*/p* *p**person_mentioned*Francisco x Eliguem*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Zadock Woods*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Mr Francisco*/person_mentioned* wants you to ask his *person_mentioned*daughter */person_mentioned*and *person_mentioned*Montraville Woods*/person_mentioned* who took her out of his *location_mentioned*house */location_mentioned*so that he Can have the person punnished for the Crime and at the same time wishes his *person_mentioned*daughter */person_mentioned*to be married as soon as possible*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*F. E*/person_mentioned*—*/p* *p**person_mentioned*Colo Stephen F Austin*/person_mentioned* *location_mentioned*San Felipe de Austin*/location_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
